summary: An exploration of the appeal of horror films, with interviews of many legendary directors in the genre.
cast: Lance Henriksen|Larry Cohen|Joe Dante|John Carpenter|Darren Lynn Bousman|Mick Garris|Tom McLoughlin|George A. Romero|Brian Yuzna|Dennis Fischer|Roger Corman|Anthony Timpone|John Kenneth Muir
title: Nightmares in Red, White and Blue: The Evolution of the American Horror Film
